dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: This is the tool shed where the caretaker, Mr. Chico, keeps his tools.

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: Do you think your sister might be in there?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Hmm! I don't see any reason for her to just go in there, especially at this time of night.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Unless she was looking for a flashlight or something.
